twitter.title: What Donald Trump Doesn’t Know About Apple Could Fill a Stadium
twitter.description: On Monday, Tim Cook’s supply chain joined the list of things Donald Trump has promised to fix—alongside the VA, the Mexican border and Obamacare. In case you missed it, this was the soundbi...
